question_text: What is the primary reason motherboard failures are often diagnosed by elimination rather than direct testing?
answer_options: Motherboards emit error codes through BIOS
Motherboard failures always generate event logs
There are no simple tools to definitively test a motherboard
Most failures are caused by user error
correct_answer: There are no simple tools to definitively test a motherboard
explanation: Motherboard issues often require ruling out all other components, since motherboards can pass POST even when partially failing.
